body_html: To me, that's a fine solution. scatter_ does the operation in-place, so returning the original tensor is what the user expects anyway (copying version Variable.scatter(...) should probably return a copy of the original variable).
body_text: To me, that's a fine solution. scatter_ does the operation in-place, so returning the original tensor is what the user expects anyway (copying version Variable.scatter(...) should probably return a copy of the original variable).
body: To me, that's a fine solution. `scatter_` does the operation in-place, so returning the original tensor is what the user expects anyway (copying version `Variable.scatter(...)` should probably return a copy of the original variable).
